Class PlayerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcodeing.kmedia.PlayerListener

extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer.Listener

          Specified by:
          onABProgress in interface IPlayer.Listener
          Parameters:
          position - current play ab position (position - abStartPosition)
          duration - ab duration (abEndPosition - abStartPosition)
          abState -
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_START
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_MID
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_END
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_FINISH

          • onNotificationRequired

            public void onNotificationRequired(int order)
            Description copied from interface: IPlayer.Listener
            Notification request(by PlayerService and Notifier maintain)

            If you have a custom condition to control whether or not the request notification -> override

             @Override
 public void onNotificationRequired(int order) {
    if (request conditions) {
      super.onNotificationRequired(order);
    } else {
      super.onNotificationRequired(0);
    }
 }
            Specified by:
            onNotificationRequired in interface IPlayer.Listener
            Parameters:
            order -
            • 0: stopNotification
            • 1: startNotification
            • 2: updateNotification
